Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
{STR_leaderName}, I don't believe we have met. I suspect you are here for the same reasons as I am, so make sure you don't get in my way. Types like you caused the downfall of the Star Union.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Well met, {STR_leaderName}. We hope that we can maintain positive relations and co-exist on this planet, that our people can re-emerge from these ruins together.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Greetings, {STR_leaderName}. It is good to meet a new face. We recently arrived on this planet as well. We hope to foster a peaceful relationship so that we may make this planet prosperous once again.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
What is it now {STR_leaderName}? Have you come to make amends?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Hello, {STR_leaderName}. What brings you to this planet?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Salutations, honorable {STR_leaderName}. Do you require assistance?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Is there anything we can help with, {STR_leaderName}?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Hello, {STR_leaderName}. We are very pleased to have received your trade offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Greetings, {STR_leaderName}. We have received your trade offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I received your paltry trade offer, {STR_leaderName}.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
My friend, {STR_leaderName}! I have a trade offer for you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Hello again, {STR_leaderName}. I have a proposal for you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, I have a trade offer for you to evaluate.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, thank you for accepting the trade.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Thank you {STR_leaderName}, I will consider your offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, I'm interested in your proposal, but it leans heavily in your favor.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}... I am very well aware of what you have done.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Greetings, {STR_leaderName}. I have some information on {STR_warnedPlayerName} that may be valuable to you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Good tidings to you, {STR_leaderName}! I come to you in my time of need with a request.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You'll need to rethink this relation of ours, {STR_leaderName}.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Hello, {STR_leaderName}. I'm glad to hear from you again.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, have mercy on our wretched souls! There has been enough bloodshed. You have proved yourself superior.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, stop fooling yourself. There is no possible chance of you claiming victory in this war.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We have received your vassalage offer, {STR_leaderName}.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, I am shocked by your warning! It was never my intention to upset our relationship.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, I hear your warning and shall take note of it.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, do you think your warning means something to me?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, this must be a mistake. I never had any part in the actions you speak of.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, why do you you accuse me of such things? You are either poorly informed or lying.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_leaderName}, how dare you spread your false propaganda about me?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I was expecting more diplomatic efforts from you, {STR_leaderName}. Are you really seeking to maintain relations?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
May our people leave the Dark Age behind us and prosper together.
We feel our relationship may be at a turning point.
We will be watching your movements closely. Any threat to our colonies will be eliminated.
I happily accept your trade offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We appreciate your offer and will gladly accept.
I suppose this offer will benefit me. I accept.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
In my opinion, I'm accepting this trade offer as a favor to you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
After very careful consideration, I will accept your trade offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Against my better judgement, I will accept your trade offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I will not refuse a gift, especially something I can use. Thank you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I will gladly do you this favor. Consider your demands accepted.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
These demands seem reasonable. I will comply.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
While purely in your favor, I will accept your demands.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You drive a hard bargain with your demands, but I shall comply, just this once.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
The proposed deal is fine. I'll gladly accept this treaty.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
The proposal seems fair enough. I will accept the treaty.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I have my doubts about this treaty, but I will accept the deal.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I will accept the proposed treaty, but there had better not be any abuse of my trust.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Now is not the right time. Come back later.
Our relationship is trouble, and I cannot accept your trade offer at this time.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I will not accept your trade offer until you provide full reconciliation for your previous actions against me.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
It is not in my interest to accept this petty trade offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You associate with the wrong types. Your offer shall not be accepted.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I cannot currently agree with your offer. This is too precious for me to give up.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
This trade is too far in your favor. Suggest a better deal. Then we'll talk.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I simply do not have the resources available to meet this request.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We already traded recently. Your offer had better be a good one. Otherwise you can try again another time.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We've only just met - I'm not ready to change the course of our relationship just yet. Perhaps later.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
We changed our relationship too recently. We can talk again at a later time.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Unfortunately, I must decline your proposal as it does not align with my plans.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Ha! Under these conditions, only cowards would accept vassalage!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Hmm, I can't accept your trade offer. Trading colonies on this scale would be detrimental to my empire.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I cannot accept your trade offer, as it would leave some of my sectors disconnected from my colonies.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I do not accept, as we only recently changed a diplomatic treaty. We can come back to this at a later time.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Trading these resources seems unwise. Come to me again with a different offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I am not that eager to trade my valuable sectors, especially since I've already exchanged one with you recently.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I am not ready to overcome these dislikes yet. Stay on my good side and we'll talk about this at a later time.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I've already declined this same offer recently and will do so again. Come back to me with a better one and maybe we'll talk then.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

I've recently come into contact with a commander of the {STR_raceName}. Perhaps I could introduce you to them? My reconnaissance comes at a price, however. Are you willing to strike a deal for this information?

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
What about this offer instead? It seems like a more even trade for the both of us.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You are pathetic, dirty rats that have crawled up out of the rubble!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
You are an abomination, an obstacle in this planet's return to greatness.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
The fall of the Star Union was caused by incompetents like you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_otherName} represents a detestable nation and stands in the way of this planet's return to greatness.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I admire your empire and foresee great prosperity from a continued and flourishing friendship between us.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Your morals and actions are in harmony with ours. We should become better friends to support each other in these dark times.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let it be known that I consider {STR_otherName} to be a true friend!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let it be known to all: "{STR_actionName} We abhor your actions!"[br/][br/]Consider yourself warned. Next time, I might not be so forgiving.

{STR_actionName} is replaced by an action - casus belli - performed by the avatar that is addressed. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. Inserted text can be found in 'Diplomacy_CasusBelli.xml'.
Let it be known to all: "{STR_actionName} We abhor your actions!"[br/][br/]Do not think that I am unaware of what you are up to. Ensure it does not happen again, or you will suffer the consequences.

{STR_actionName} is replaced by an action - casus belli - performed by the avatar that is addressed. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. Inserted text can be found in 'Diplomacy_CasusBelli.xml'.
{STR_actionName}! {STR_warnedPlayerName} might do this again, and is not to be trusted!

{STR_warnedPlayerName} is replaced by the name of the avatar that undertook the {STR_actionName}. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. {STR_actionName} is replaced by an action - casus belli - performed by the avatar spoken about. Inserted text can be found in 'Diplomacy_CasusBelli.xml'.
I cannot uphold this treaty with you any longer; {STR_reasons}. It is a disgrace to my empire.

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I feel this trade may benefit both us. {STR_actionName}

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Trading will bring our empires closer together. {STR_actionName}
I would like to propose a treaty: {STR_actionName} It would mean a lot to me if we could come to an agreement.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_actionName} This treaty enables us to strengthen our relationship. Please accept my offer.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let us bring forth peace and prosperity by improving our diplomatic state. {STR_actionName}
We can be stronger together! {STR_actionName} So that we can tie a closer diplomatic bond.
I could be a powerful ally to you. Let us form a stronger connection between our people. {STR_actionName}

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Let's forget about mistakes from the past. A little bit of tribute may go a long way on the road to forgiveness.
My accountants tell me this trade is highly in your favor, but I would lie if I said it wasn't mutually beneficial.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I propose that you trade this sector with me. I have done the calculations, and this should prove mutually beneficial.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
A gift for you, to show my intentions. May this improve the relationship between our people.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I would not ask this of you if I did not feel the need, but I require a favor of you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
My empire shall dominate the planet! You will pay this tribute or be crushed.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I am fighting a war against {STR_warPlayerName} and am in need of your assistance, ally. I trust that our relationship is such that you will provide the help that I need.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Blessings upon you, {STR_leaderName}. I am grateful for the positive relationship that we share.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I'm afraid that this relationship will not last much longer. This will turn sour quickly. You may eventually find my armies on your doorstep…

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
This is it, {STR_reasons}. We hereby declare war on you and your wretched people! {STR_actionName}

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I can no longer maintain our current diplomatic state because {STR_reasons}. {STR_actionName}

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Our relationship is not what it used to be - {STR_reasons}. {STR_actionName}

{STR_reasons} is a list of reasons, written like "You trespassed" and can be found in this excel sheet. This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I heed your call - together we stand strong. We shall rise victorious from this war!

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I have received a call from my allies. Together we stand strong against you. Our combined force will destroy you.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I cannot join you in combat, even if that means the end of our alliance.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Please accept me as your loyal vassal.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
In light of your imminent defeat, you should do us both a favor and become a vassal to prevent further loss. Your survival depends on it.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
I will spare you total annihilation and accept you as my eternal vassal.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
{STR_vassalPlayerName} has done the right thing and is now my respected vassal. May others follow suit and enjoy the protection of the rightful overlord of this planet.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Agree to my demands for this peace deal and you will be allowed to live.

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

All of the below texts refer to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
My friend {STR_leaderName}, how are you doing? Hopefully we can foster a positive relationship between us.
GENERIC MESSAGE: GOOD VELOCITY, IMPROVE DIPLOMATIC STATE
We can become close comrades, {STR_leaderName}. Let us continue to form stronger bonds between our people.
GENERIC MESSAGE: GOOD VELOCITY, IMPROVE DIPLOMATIC STATE
Greetings, {STR_leaderName}. It is good to see you. It would please me to continue this relationship in more postive directions.
GENERIC MESSAGE: GOOD VELOCITY, IMPROVE DIPLOMATIC STATE
{STR_leaderName}, how glorious! It is great to see you again, my friend. I hope that our factions can further improve our relations and work together more in the future.

{STR_leaderName}, I hope we can maintain our current relationship. My empire is thriving in this age of cooperation.

GENERIC MESSAGE: GOOD VELOCITY, MAINTAIN DIPLOMATIC STATE

GENERIC MESSAGE: BAD VELOCITY, END-WAR DIPLOMATIC STATE

Compliment {STR_leaderName} for something they have done or achieved. This will only affect the message they receive; the effects will not differ from sending a general compliment.
Send an insult because of something {STR_leaderName} has done or achieved. This will only affect the message they receive; the effects will not differ from sending a general insult.
